pageProduct.name: Swisse Hair Nutrition For Men 60 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

SUPPORTS HAIR GROWTH.

MAINTAINS HEALTHY HAIR FOLLICLES & SCALP HEALTH.

SWISSE ULTIBOOST HAIR NUTRITION FOR MEN is a premium quality formula with:

Biotin to help support hair growth, maintain healthy hair follicles and scalp health.

Silica and manganese to assist connective tissue formation - connective tissue of the scalp surrounds hair follicles, providing important physical support.

Saw palmetto, which naturally contains fatty acids

Zinc to support healthy testosterone levels in the blood -  testosterone and its by-product dihydrotestosterone (DHT) influence hair growth

Size: 60 Capsules

Warnings

(SEE DIRECTIONS FOR USE).

Ingredients

EACH CAPSULE CONTAINS:
Saw Palmetto (Serenoa repens extract 20 mg) equiv. dry fruit (standardised to contain fatty acids 9 mg) 250 mg (min.); Vitamin A (retinol acetate) 112.50 mcg/RE; Biotin 1.30 mg; Vitamin C (ascorbic acid) 6.25 mg; Vitamin D3 (colecalciferol 500 IU) 12.5 mcg; Nicotinamide 8 mg; Copper (from copper gluconate) 212.50 mcg; Iodine (from potassium iodide) 149 mcg; Manganese (from manganese amino acid chelate) 700 mcg; Selenium (from selenomethionine) 27.50 mcg; Silica (colloidal anhydrous silica) 26.77 mg; Zinc (from zinc amino acid chelate) 7.5 mg; Soya Oil 50 mg; Sunflower Oil 50 mg.

Directions

DIRECTIONS FOR USE - ADULT DOSAGE:
Two capsules daily, during or immediately after a meal, or as directed by a healthcare professional.
WARNING: When taken in excess of 3000 mcg/RE, vitamin A can cause birth defects. If you are pregnant, or considering becoming pregnant, do not take vitamin A supplements without consulting your doctor or pharmacist.

The recommended daily amount of vitamin A from all sources is 700 mcg/RE for women and 900 mcg/RE for men.

This product contains selenium, which is toxic in high doses.

A daily dose of 150 mcg for adults of selenium from dietary supplements should not be exceeded.

Vitamin & mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C in a cool, dry place.
